items.title: Pre-order deals: AirPods Pro 3 and Apple Watch Series 11/Ultra 3 now live [Update #3]
items.summary:
Apple has now officially unleashed its next-generation iPhone 17 lineup, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch SE3, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and the new AirPods Pro 3. All of this joins a host of new accessories and is now up for pre-order (iPhone 17 pre-sales go live on Friday though). While you can of course pre-order all of the new gear straight from Apple, it is also all now live on Amazon, and if you have some FREE store credit on your account from all of the promotional offers we have featured over the last several months – there were hundreds in Amazon credit promotions live for Prime Day this year – you can now leverage it on the new Apple gear.

items.title: Nintendo announces Super Mario Galaxy + Galaxy 2 bundle: Runs in 4K on Switch 2, new content, more
items.summary:
Update: Pre-orders on physical copies of the new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle are now live at Walmart and Target. 

Tomorrow is the 40th anniversary for Super Mario Bros. and Nintendo is ready to celebrate. During today’s Direct presentation it debuted a ton of exciting updates and new releases for Mario’s 40th, including a new teaser trailer and confirmation of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie. However, on top of that we are also getting a new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle release as well as two new companion amiibo figures too.

items.title: All of the Mario 40th anniversary reveals: Mario Galaxy, Tennis Fever, new Yoshi game, and an actual Talking Flower
items.summary:
Nintendo’s big September Direct is a wrap and it certainly did not disappoint for Mario’s big 40th anniversary. The first Super Mario Bros. game released almost exactly 40 years ago and Nintendo unsheathed this year’s celebration with a host of key announcements in the form of upgraded versions of beloved Mario classics, a new Switch 2 Edition of one of the best 2D Mario games of the modern era, the official announcement of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, a new Yoshi game, the new Mario Tennis experience, and a even a talking flower.

This model usually goes for $800 at full price, but it’s been more routinely selling for $700, which we’ve mostly been seeing dropped between $550 and $600 with discounts, though there was a one-time drop to the $500 low during July’s Prime Day event, rising to $520 for a short period after. items.summary:
Gabe Rivera / Techmeme News:
On Techmeme's 20th birthday, its founder explains what's behind the site's consistency, debunks some supposed media trends, and outlines future directions  —  Please clap for Techmeme  —  Techmeme turns 20 freaking years old today.  This is our self-congratulatory post marking the occasion.

items.title: This 20W dual USB-C wall charger just hit $6.50 Prime shipped (33% off)
items.summary:
VOLTME 20W Dual USB-C Wall Charger

Buy for $6.50 (Reg. $10)

What we love

While there’s no shortage of 20W wall chargers out there, you might as well opt for a solution that has two ports instead of just one. That’s the headlining feature with this unit. That, and well, it’s $6.50 price point.

more…

items.title: All-new Beats iPhone 17/Air cases arrive with light launch deals: Kickstand lanyard, Rugged texture, more
items.summary:
After taking its first jump into the iPhone case space for iPhone 16 last year, Apple’s Beats brand has a fresh collection of covers for this year’s iPhone 17, 17 Pro, and iPhone Air models up for grabs. This year’s lineup features three different models – the basic matte finish variant with MagSafe and Camera Control, the Rugged Case with a textured finish and impact-absorbing sidewalls, and finally, the Kickstand Case with a detachable lanyard that doubles as a stand. On top of that, we are already tracking some light launch discounts on several of them at Amazon. 

more…

items.title: MIFA’s recently-released starlight elastic Apple Watch band with stainless steel hardware falls to $21 (Reg. $25)
items.summary:
MIFA Starlight Elastic Apple Watch Band

Buy for $21 (Reg. $25)

What we love

There’s something about the look of this band that really appeals to me. If I had to put my finger on it, I think it ranges from the rugged appearance to its stretchy design. The whole thing has a vintage vibe to it that I think helps set it apart from many others out there.

more…
